channel.title: William Hexberg
channel.description: A blog about my favorite web conferences.

item.title: SassConf
item.description:
SassConf is an awesome confernce for front-end developers and designers who love Sass and are passionate about building a better, more beautiful web.

This year, the conference is in Austin, Texas!

item.title: Camp Sass!
item.description:
Camp Sass is a one-day, one-track Sass conference held in Atlanta, GA. It’s hosted by Hampton Catlin, the inventor of Sass!

At this year’s conference, I had lots of fun, learned a ton, and met many talented web designers and developers.

item.title: Converge
item.description:
Converge assemble some of the best speakers in the industry to inform and inspire you! It’s for the love of the web and the love of our community. This year’s event includes a full schedule of keynotes, sessions, and workshops.

Check it out!

item.title: Treehouse Meetups
item.description:
Treehouse is excited to announce new locations for Treehouse Meetups! Treehouse Meetups are events for treehouse students, friends and anyone with an interest or passion for the web. Whether you’re beginner or advanced, everyone is welcome!

There are now Treehouse Meetups in Chicago, New York, Portland, and Orlando.

Join your closest community to stay up-to-date with upcoming Treehouse Meetup news. If there isn’t a Treehouse Meetup next to you yet, don’t worry! Treehouse plans to continue to expand to new locations in the upcoming months.
